title: How to get pen ink out of the clothes drier - Quora

response.answer_text: Ink can be tough to get out of clothing, but if it's just inside the dryer you could try a magic eraser. I've used them to clean up a really dried on paint mess, on a whim, and they worked better than I wanted to admit at the time. Lol. Wish I had tried it sooner. Good luck! Shawna
